sentences.en: All of the passengers started the day with a swim.
sentences.cn: 所有的乘客那天一开始就先游了个泳。

sentences.en: Children swim at the pool, under the watchful eye of lifeguards.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在救生员的监护下在水池里游泳。

sentences.en: Don't go out of your depth; you can't swim.
sentences.cn: 不要到水深没顶的地方去, 你不会游泳.

sentences.en: During winter, many people swim and the pool is crowded.
sentences.cn: 冬季来游泳的人很多，泳池人满为患。

sentences.en: He must sink or swim by his own efforts now.
sentences.cn: 现在得靠他自己去闯了.

sentences.en: I swim a mile a day.
It was very much sink or swim.
sentences.cn: 这很大程度上就是不成功便沉沦。

sentences.en: It's too wide. We can't swim across.
sentences.cn: 这太宽了，我们游不过去。

sentences.en: kids learning to swim the backstroke

sentences.cn: 今天下午我们游泳去吧。

sentences.en: One afternoon, she went for a swim in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 一天下午她到海里去游泳.

sentences.en: She has a phobia about water and can't swim.
She was the first woman to swim the Channel.
sentences.cn: 她是第一个游过英吉利海峡的女性。

sentences.en: The barriers are lethal to fish trying to swim upstream.
sentences.cn: 这些障碍物对于想要往上游游动的鱼儿来说是致命的。

sentences.en: The musty aroma of incense made her head swim.
sentences.cn: 熏香发霉的气味令她感到头晕。

sentences.en: When can we go for a swim, Mam?
sentences.cn: 妈妈，我们什么时候能去游泳啊？

sentences.en: Work out at a gym or swim twice a week.
sentences.cn: 一周去健身房锻炼两次，或游两次泳。

words.tran_cn: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

phrases.tran_cn: 积极投身于当前事务的
顺应（或反）潮流（或当前流行的观点或趋势）

trans.tran_en: a period of time that you spend swimming
to move yourself through water using your arms and legs
to move yourself through water using your arms and legs

trans.tran_cn: 游泳，游动，浸泡，充溢着，眩晕，旋转
trans.tran_en: to move yourself through water using your arms and legs
to move yourself through water using your arms and legs
